website_summaries.verdict: Made in the USA from premium grade human quality meat. Dental and joint health along with a great taste.
pros: Provides your dog with both a tasty snack as well as a healthy one
Packed with Glucosamine to help with joints as well as protein to help ensure overall dog health
Includes a thirty day promise of satisfaction
cons: Not the thickest type of jerky which is a setback for some dogs
Does offer ingredients that are beneficial to a healthful canine diet

customer_reviews.title: Doggie approved
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these treats. He always forgets to say thank you though, when I offer them to him. He just snatches it and runs. Kinda rude if you ask me.
customer_reviews.author: dacrew873

customer_reviews.title: My dog loved it until I received the one smells like dead fish...
customer_reviews.text: This was my dog favorite treat until o received the one it smells like dead fish. I opened the bag 5 days after I received. It looked whiter than usual however I didn’t care that much, until I opened... My dog was already excited but I just couldn’t take a risk of giving him bad jersey that I don’t really know why it smells like dead fish. It was really that bad smell. I had to close it right away. He really liked this treat and I was planning to Keep buying them. Very upset.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey thomas

customer_reviews.title: My Dog loves these!
customer_reviews.text: My Dog loves these beef sticks! As soon as I open the bag he is wagging his tail and running towards his bed to get his treat! They don’t have much of a smell to them, therefore he is allowed to eat them where he pleases in the house (he prefers his bed). I give him one a day after our run. Great product and I would highly recommend. My dog is 60 pounds and it is a good size treat for him.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: My pup goes crazy for them!
customer_reviews.text: They are on the thinner side of jerky, which makes them easier to break up into smaller pieces. I also think this makes them less of a choking hazard. I do have to watch my pup to make sure he chews, because he inhales them the second he gets ahold of them. If I give him a whole piece, it will occupy him for a few minutes. I have a smaller dog (15lbs) that is a medium chewer.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna C

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves them
customer_reviews.text: What's more to be said? The pup kills these things and would eat the whole bag if he could..but he also licks his butt so I can't be a judge on flavor. Judging by the label though, these seem to be high quality treats. They're a bit thin but don't leave any residue on the carpet and no bad breath - I'd call that a win.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great treat for smaller dogs
customer_reviews.text: As for flavor, I’ll go with the fact both of my dogs love them. I was looking for something thin that my small dog could enjoy and this was great for that. They are a bit pricey but it’s a good amount in the bag and the dogs enjoy them. For dogs over 20-25 lbs these won’t last long at all but for my 15 lb dog they’re a nice thin, easier for a small dog, chew treat. Easily cut in half if desired. These are long strips 8-9 inches long, about 2 inches wide.
customer_reviews.author: Atl John

customer_reviews.title: Made my Golden Retriever sick.
customer_reviews.text: My Dog loved to chew on these treats. But the only two times I gave him one, he ate it (slowly and happily) only to get sluggish until he threw up the skeleton of these treats, still intact. They get slippery and slid down his throat, making him sick. Won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A quick treat but a Very rotten smell that stays on hands and anywhere the dogs takes it.
customer_reviews.text: These Are very stinky As soon as I opened the bag it smells like rotten meat. Anywhere he eats this is left with rotten meat smell and have to wash hands with soap and water so I don’t spread the stink. Dog Seems likes it, he goes through it in just a few minutes. we can’t get past the smell so will open the bag and leave outside and see if that helps. Otherwise going to only give outside this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Sidebottom

customer_reviews.title: Fail
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought other products by this brand that were fine. This one, not so much. I don’t think they can really be called “chews” because they’re paper thin. You can actually see through some of them and the ones you can’t see through are still paper thin. My dogs just eat them like any other treat, gone in seconds. So in my opinion they are not worth $20/bag. I gave two stars only because I believe they’re from grass fed, free range cattle. But I won’t buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My small dogs really like these and they are digestible.
customer_reviews.text: I split these in half and give them one or two a day to keep their teeth clean. I don't think they would last long at all for a larger dog,, but they would be good as a crunchy digestible treat for 10-15 minutes of chewing. I would rather have them consumed than have half a dozen gross partly chewed "treats" all over the house like some of the longer-lasting ones I tried.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: smells stale
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if my dog would like it better if it was fresher, but it had a stale smell and my dog doesn't seem to like it much.
customer_reviews.author: Neversink7

customer_reviews.title: Gone in 5 seconds!
customer_reviews.text: Hoped they would be a little thicker, and would make my pitty work a little at breaking them down, but alas they are not. He had these gone in about 5 seconds. Obviously, the taste must be good as he gets excited when given one, but considering they last seconds for a larger dog to devour, they make for pretty expensive treats.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope40

customer_reviews.title: Quality changed🤔
customer_reviews.text: My Dogs used to love these... but the last 2 orders have been sub par. Very short, stringy very tendon like. The dogs chew but end up with strips all over the floor. Then they just leave them. Too bad..was a great product
customer_reviews.author: Joan Aldrich

customer_reviews.title: LOVED them!
customer_reviews.text: My new rescue pup LOVED these jerky treats. They are tasty, healthy, and keep her entertained for a little bit. We also bought Pawstruck bully sticks and she was so excited when we opened up the box! I would definitely recommend these to any dog owners
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Great chews
customer_reviews.text: Our dog really enjoys these chews. They don't last nearly as long as a bully stick or cow ear, but we stuff them inside a toy so she has to work at getting to it and that seems to help with longevity. The value is great for the quality and the company seems to have great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: nursetraveler

customer_reviews.title: Lab approves!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 month old lab pup loves it. He finished one in a matter of a minute or so (I did not count it though). I did not notice smell though I have a dog nose LOL. Or it did not bother me at all. For the money? It's bit pricey but I guess a quality food/treat cost little more.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Excellent treat that dogs will Love! Bonus joint Health!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog Sadie absolutely Loves this jerky! We only give her one at night . I’ve never seen her so excited for a treat before, but she actually stares at me while dancing around when she knows she is going to get one! She is a 14 lb rat terrier ! She has it chewed up in five minutes tops! Then tries begging for more!
customer_reviews.author: Marlene

customer_reviews.title: These smell bad and made the dog ill
customer_reviews.text: The smell is beyond rancid. We couldn’t even bring them in the house... my daughter do don’t realize and gave one to our dog and now she is very sick. DO NOT BUY THESE and if you do, and they smell bad, return them. So upset. On top of COVID isolation my dog is horribly ill.
customer_reviews.author: Mk

customer_reviews.title: Skip loves these chews
customer_reviews.text: I love that they don't stink up the house & that the ingredients are top quality. I've offered him others, but if he sees the Pawstruck bag, he'll actually turn down the other treats! Thanks, Pawstruck ... anything to make my pup happy!
customer_reviews.author: KARI A. HESS

customer_reviews.title: My dogs favorite treats
customer_reviews.text: I spoil my dogs and buy far too many toys and treats. These....for whatever reason are their #1 favorite. Hands down. They go fast though. Eats them fast and empties the bag fast! So not great if you’re looking for a low cost long chew treat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dog didn’t love these
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these for my dog before through another vendor and she could not get enough of them. However this particular bath purchased through amazon the jerkey pieces were more inconsistent in size and thickness. Many of them were thick and fibrous and she could not eat them.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: My Dogs are very picky and they love this
customer_reviews.text: I can get desperate trying to find things my dogs like as treats and food. I took a chance on this and found they love this! Sometimes I split them down the middle to make them last longer. I highly recommend them as great treats.
customer_reviews.author: Kosborne1

customer_reviews.title: Maybe not so great for the ‘not so bright dog’!
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to be great for my smaller dog ( Yorkie) but my French Bulldog kept trying to put the whole thing in his mouth, no matter what size we gave him, then ‘gakking’ it up. I don’t know if Buster is just slow or what... just an FYI
customer_reviews.author: Cyndy J Green

customer_reviews.title: Bindi approves!
customer_reviews.text: Our furry princess is spoiled to the max (naturally!) and has had many different treats and chews. I love how these are shaped differently and despite how thin they are they’re not fragile! The pieces were bigger than I expected — which she loved as well as I. :)
customer_reviews.author: NikkiNoodle1127Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Smelly and made dog sick
customer_reviews.text: My Doberman had one of these treats (which was gone in less than 5 minutes) and had an upset stomach with diarrhea! It made my dog sick and smells awful, like dead fish!! Unfortunately ended up throwing the bag away- but I could not risk him getting sick again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love all the Pawstruck chews and treats.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs both love these, but go through them very quickly. One is a Portuguese Water Dog puppy of 6 months, the other is a an ancient cockapoo. Pawstruck has wonderful treats and chews with totally safe ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Onlineshopper

customer_reviews.title: Dogs Destroyed the Bag
customer_reviews.text: My dogs teamed up to rip up this bag they liked it so much. When I got them out of the bag I didn't think they would because the chews are thin and dry. I would never eat them, but my dogs loved them. Just don't give them any close to bed unless you want to hear them chew haha.
customer_reviews.author: NathanHalling33

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love them!
customer_reviews.text: Dogs love them! I on the other hand am not a big fan of the smell, but it's not for me.🙂🐶 They do not last more than 5 minites with my two dogs(110lbs and 50 lbs) Definitely a buy
customer_reviews.author: LRH

customer_reviews.title: Amy Farah Howler approves!
customer_reviews.text: This is the Stuff. The Dookie. The Dog's Favorite. If your Human Friend is using these to train and reward you, then you're as happy as I am! My Dogmom breaks each up into smaller pieces for training rewards, and an occasional whole strip when she's going to have to leave me crated for some time. Wag hard for this. Ask your mom to get it. She will understand that this is what you really wanted all along. Bow wow wow. Sincerely yours, Amy Farah Howler, Beagle.
customer_reviews.author: Diana B. Wilde

customer_reviews.title: Unbearable smell
customer_reviews.text: In no way can I recommend these. They smell TERRIBLE. I could smell their stench through the packaging. No way can I store these in my home without the room reeking of bad meat.
customer_reviews.author: Gus

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but dogs love 'em
customer_reviews.text: My Dane and Coonhound enjoy these healthy treats as much or more than bully sticks! Thin and flat, so easier for smaller dogs too. (They don't last long in my house, so I only gave one star for longevity.)
customer_reviews.author: Myra A. Mason

customer_reviews.title: Expired
customer_reviews.text: They were expired. My dog usually loves these but when I ordered it from Amazon she did not even want to look at it. They are more white than the normal ones. You can tell they are expired and old.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Our dog seems to love these
customer_reviews.text: It's good to have a treat that will last for a little while and it's especially good to have it not made out of that nasty rawhide stuff. The only thing was the smell is pretty strident especially when you first open the package but the dog seems to love them.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Caudill

customer_reviews.title: Doggie loves it
customer_reviews.text: Smells great. My fur baby is medium size so I cut the strips in half then cut it in half again. He loves to chew these after his meal. A treat for him. Good value, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Momotaro

customer_reviews.title: Dogs LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: Both my import German shepherd show dog and our malti-poo love this more than another snack they get I have bought multiple times and will continue
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Pups favorite snack
customer_reviews.text: These are my dogs favorite snacks! I wish they weren't so expensive as she goes through them quickly. But I guess you have to pay for quality.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Milo’s favorite treat
customer_reviews.text: My Jack Russell terrier loves these. They’re special treats, and when he sees me opening the container in which they’re kept, he leaps for joy.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis A. Dinkel

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Was pretty bummed- picture looks like these are think treats. They ate paper thin. Can literally see through them. My dogs were done with them in less then a minute. Loved the pure ingredients but not worth the money for paper thin tissue paper like jerky... I stacked 3 of them on top of each other and finally only a little bit of light came through. Very bummed.
customer_reviews.author: suzanna

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last more than a couple minutes
customer_reviews.text: then work worth a darn. Dog devoured it about 2 minutes big waste of money for me
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Tasty treat (I am assuming) for my pup!
customer_reviews.text: My pup seems to like this more than other treats. I try to limit the number per day since too much appears to loosen her stool consistency. Overall, a decent and preferred treat for my k9 companion!
customer_reviews.author: k9doc1

customer_reviews.title: Gone in 60 Seconds
customer_reviews.text: The dog is obsessed with these treats. Never upsets her stomach, a bit of an odor but gone in seconds since she loves them so much.
customer_reviews.author: AK_Vance

customer_reviews.title: Good high-value low-cost daily chews
customer_reviews.text: They’re not huge, but there are a lot of them in the bag (60-70?) I was giving my dog bully sticks, then beef ears, now these. I realized I couldn’t afford to feed bully sticks every day. Even ears are a bit much for daily feeding. These are perfect. We sometimes do two per day if his pal is over to play.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey S

customer_reviews.title: My pup LOVES these
customer_reviews.text: My pup loves these so much. They are the perfect snack and keep him very happy. You get so much for the price, I usually buy them once a month.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: My Dog Loves Them
customer_reviews.text: I love them because my dog loves them. He is a Special Dog and I don't know what I would do without him.
customer_reviews.author: patsams

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: Mommy gives me these treats when she's been gone for a while. I love them! It actually takes me a while to get through one. I don't mind when she leaves the house anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these things and hasn't gotten sick
customer_reviews.text: These make Missy's day. She loves the chew factor. Glad she has remained safe eating them.
customer_reviews.author: Readaholic

customer_reviews.title: Pooch loves em!
customer_reviews.text: I guess they have a good flavor- my crazy dog ate them up happily. Will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Marimba

customer_reviews.title: Favorite treat of all!
customer_reviews.text: Hard to say on taste. My dog love, love, loves these Jerky Treats! By far her favorite of all her treats. They are easy for her to chew.
customer_reviews.author: Croode

customer_reviews.title: Dog did not like
customer_reviews.text: My dog ate one and threw up 5 minutes later. Another day he ate another and threw up again 5 minutes later. He does not like these treats at all.
customer_reviews.author: Alan H Burnett

customer_reviews.title: dog approved
customer_reviews.text: My pup loves these types of treats. His testimony: He gobbled these right up!
customer_reviews.author: MurryO

customer_reviews.title: Dog is Addicted
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product my dog loves it! He’ll do anything for it and will restore to trying to climb the counter to reach them 🤣
customer_reviews.author: Sharla Mercado

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love them!!!
customer_reviews.text: Normally I can give my pup a treat and ask for it back and they oblige. That was not the case with this so I can only presume that they loved them. The product arrived in a timely manner
customer_reviews.author: Ramona

customer_reviews.title: Delivered to wrong person
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this. I ordered this and some batteries and dish soap. Was delivered to the wrong person. I never got it

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Puppies love them. Feel better know they are getting a quality chew

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love them
customer_reviews.text: Dogs enjoy the treat and its good on their stomachs. They last an evening not just a few minutes.

customer_reviews.title: Smell Awful
customer_reviews.text: The dog seamed to like them but I didn’t like the way they smelled so I threw them away...

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves them and will perform like a circus dog for them.

customer_reviews.title: New Lab loves them
customer_reviews.text: Our newly adopted 4 yo lab loves these. Will continue to purchase.

customer_reviews.title: I love these
customer_reviews.text: My dogs absolutely love these dog treats. They go nuts for them. They are stinky but that's okay. I love that they are natural and that the dogs love them!

customer_reviews.title: Healthy- no preservatives-made in USA
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love th this product. I like it because it has healthy ingredients and made in USA

customer_reviews.title: DOG GOT SICK
customer_reviews.text: Bought this before but this time around smelt REALLY BAD. My Dog threw up and had diarrhea! Never again!

customer_reviews.title: My pup loves these
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these strips. They aren’t stinky to me and aren’t greasy.

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog LOVES these! Thin, crispy. Bag is resealable. Smells like jerky, but not super smelly or nasty.

customer_reviews.title: Great producr
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these! Alot friskier about half hour after eating.

customer_reviews.title: One of the Best!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best dog toy stuffer! Dogs love "Pawstruck" products!!

customer_reviews.title: good product.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves them he helps himself once a day to one.

customer_reviews.title: Who''s a Good Dog
customer_reviews.text: These chews may not last that long but Sparky and Frisco are All in when they get one, just a perfect treat!

customer_reviews.title: They are not a lasting chew....my pup ate it in seconds
customer_reviews.text: My pup absolutely loved these treats! He couldn’t get enough of them. My only complaint....The price could come down a little bit......

customer_reviews.title: Dog seems to like it just fine
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how it tastes, but i can smell it just fine (ugh!), and dog says buy more.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent joint treat
customer_reviews.text: She loves her joint treats. They are the perfect size and I love that there is nothing artificial in them.

customer_reviews.title: Good price, not preferred by dog
customer_reviews.text: This one year old puppy does not really care for it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hyland

customer_reviews.title: 3 furry happy customers
customer_reviews.text: All three of my dogs loved these! Sometimes, other raw hide treats give them tummy troubles but they have no complaints with these. I almost missed the ingredient list because it's only one item! Even for little teeth, my dogs had a good time chewing!
customer_reviews.author: Alaura

customer_reviews.title: Doggo approved
customer_reviews.text: Our dog absolutely loves these, we have bought this product at least 5 times now.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly D.

customer_reviews.title: Fur babies love Pawstruck products !!!
customer_reviews.text: My babies love your products !!! They are the only ones that I am going to buy from now on! Good quality! I don't want to feed my babies junk, even if it is a treat. Thank you

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch?
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these before and my dog loved them. This batch is dry and my dog isn’t interested.

customer_reviews.title: Great dog treats
customer_reviews.text: My puppy loves these treats. I rather have him chew one of these than my furniture.

customer_reviews.text: made both our dogs sick with diarrhea and vomiting. no return available from vendor. DO NOT RECOMMEND

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love this and they are picky.
customer_reviews.text: I think it is a little expensive for treats, but my dogs love them so I buy it. I could not put a correct longevity description on them because my dogs beg for them (they know where I keep them), so they do not last long.

customer_reviews.title: My dog’s favorite treat.
customer_reviews.text: Loved by my dog! He begs for one every night. He has me well trained.

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these
customer_reviews.text: My dog is really picky about treats, but he loves these.

customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these things! I break them in half for my dog and he devours it.

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves them!

customer_reviews.text: My dogs absolutely love this!! It’s thin enough that even my old guy can enjoy it! I’ll definitely be getting more soon!

product_meta.title: Pawstruck Dog Jerky Treats - Joint Health Beef Chews - Bulk, Gourmet, Fresh & Savory Gullet Straps - Naturally Rich in Glucosamine & Chondroitin - Promotes Healthy Joints by USA Company
feature_bullets: High Quality Dog Treats Made With Love: Keep your dogs happy and healthy with single-ingredient pet treats. Our delectable, protein-packed and guilt-free dog snacks are slow-cooked to perfection, bursting with flavors that your dogs will surely love. Our facilities are carefully inspected and approved to ensure clean, safe and healthy canine snacks.

All-Natural, Tasty Surprise: Our furry pals deserve the same goodness that comes from all-natural food. Just like us, their food should be made of wholesome ingredients that are sourced from free-range and grass-fed cattle. Free from allergens such as grains and soy, these tasty treats are guaranteed to keep your pet (and you!) happy.

Cleans Teeth and Easily Digestible: The high meat percentage makes it easy for your pets to digest. Show your dogs extra love and care with these long-lasting chews. They are perfect for getting rid of nasty plaque and tartar that can cause gum problems and other dental diseases. Even fussy dogs will keep coming back for more!

Promotes Healthy Joints and Hips: Not only will your dogs love the flavor and have fun chewing on their healthy treats, these health jerkies are packed with glucosamine and chondroitin to ensure strong joints and hips. They’re a wonderful alternative to supplements that keep your canines in tip-top condition.

30-Day Satisfaction Guarantee: To ensure that we are providing only the best, safest and finest snacks for your furry pals, we only source our dog treat ingredients from reliable, first-rate providers. Made from premium, real meat that’s perfect for any breed.
